title: Ticket #1464: Close/re-open all log files if DAGMan is "stuck"
description: We've seen a situation a few times where DAGMan is unable to "see" some node job log file events. In the past, we worked around this by doing condor_hold/condor_release on DAGMan, but we could work around it automatically by closing and re-opening all log files if we haven't seen any events for more than a certain (configurable) amount of time.
remarks:
2010-Jun-29 14:17:08 by wenger:
Miron suggested that we should close and re-open each log file after a specified time period.
